programme.title: Men's 10m Platform Final | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 10m Platform Final took place at the Aquatics Centre, on 10/08/24. Yuan Cao (CHN) won Gold, Rikuto Tamai (JPN) won Silver and Noah Williams (GBR) completed the podium.

programme.title: Heroes of The Future 2 | Episode 2
programme.desc: In this episode: Agentinian sport climber Valentina Aguado, Mexican diver Randal Willars Valdez, and Puerto Rican boxer Lionel Colon.

programme.title: Archery’s “Fan of the Year” Finds His Path Through Autism with the Sport
programme.desc: Andrew Hornsby is the sport’s biggest fan and is surprised with a trip across the globe to attend the Indoor World Finals

programme.title: An Se Young (KOR) v He Bing Jiao (CHN) - Women's Singles Gold Medal Match | Badminton | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Women's Singles Gold Medal match between An Se Young (KOR) v He Bing Jiao (CHN) which took place at the Porte de La Chapelle Arena on 05/08/24. An Se Young (KOR) won the match with a final score of 2:0.
The medal ceremony saw An Se Young (KOR) take Gold, He Bing Jiao (CHN) take Silver and Gregoria Tunjung (INA) take the Bronze medal.

programme.title: How Spain’s Carolina Marin wrecked Asia’s badminton hegemony
programme.desc: At the 2016 Olympic Games, Carolina Marin became the first female athlete from outside Asia to win badminton singles gold.

programme.title: Jia Min Yeo (SGP) v Dorsa Yavarivafa (EOR) - Women's Singles Group Play | Badminton | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Singles Group Play match between Jia Min Yeo (SGP) v Dorsa Yavarivafa (EOR) took place on 27/07/2024 at La Chapelle Arena. Jia Min Yeo (SGP) won the match with a score of 2:0.

programme.title: Badminton vs Cricket with Srikanth Kidambi and Yuzvendra Chahal | Sports Swap India
programme.desc: Can cricketers play badminton? And what happens when India’s badminton champion Srikanth Kidambi swaps his racket for a cricket bat?

programme.title: Youth take Centre Stage | The Academy
programme.desc: We head behind the scenes and hang out with of some of India’s rising badminton talent.

programme.title: Nuffin for Nuffin | Documentary
programme.desc: Forty-five years after their first and only Olympic medal, Bermuda's hopes of glory now rest on the shoulders of a new generation of boxers. See how these young boxers overcome adversity and struggle beyond the ropes to keep this tiny island nation's Olympic dreams alive.

programme.title: Mariah: A Boxer’s Dream | Film
programme.desc: 16-year-old Navajo boxer Mariah Bahe is fighting against all odds to become the first female Native American Olympic boxer.

programme.title: Track and Field - Day 12 - Afternoon | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Track and Field Day 12 Afternoon Session took place at the Stade de France, France, on 09/08/24. It included Women's Pole Vault Final, Men's Discus Throw Final, Men's 400m Final, and the Semi-Finals for 110m Hurdles, 400m Hurdles, 200m, 400m.

programme.title: Heroes of the Future - Giorgia Villa & Demis Angagregn
programme.desc: Giorgia Villa, a 12 year old Italian Artistic Gymnast, and Demis Angagregn, a 16 year old Runner from Ethiopia, compete for their future.

programme.title: Global Games (Part I)
programme.desc: Four Olympians and four social media stars from around the world go head to head in mash-up competitions with an Olympic twist.

programme.title: Heats, Quarter-Finals, Semi-Finals & Finals | Canoe Sprint | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session includes the Women's Canoe Single 200m Heats, the Men's Canoe Double 500m Semi-Finals, the Women's Kayak Four 500m Semi-Finals, the Men's Kayak Four 500m Semi-Finals, the Women's Canoe Single 200m Quarter-Finals, the Men's Canoe Double 500m Finals, the Women's Kayak Four 500m Finals and the Men's Kayak Four 500m Finals which took place at the Vaires-Sur-Marne Nautical Stadium on 08/08/24.
The Men's Canoe Double 500m Finals were won by Liu Hao/Ji Bowen (CHN) with Gold, Gabriele Casadei/Carlo Tacchini (ITA) with Silver and Joan Antoni Moreno/Diego Dominguez (ESP) with Bronze.
The Women's Kayak Four 500m Finals were won by New Zealand who won Gold, Germany won Silver and Hungary won Bronze.
The Men's Kayak Four 500m Finals were won by Germany who won Gold, Australia won Silver and Spain won Bronze.

programme.title: Helen Glover eyes Paris 2024 for her fourth Olympics | Athletes to Watch
programme.desc: After winning back-to-back gold in London 2012 and Rio 2016, Helen Glover made a remarkable come-back in Tokyo 2020, being the first mother to row for Britain. She and partner Polly Swann finished fourth. Helen now has her sights on Paris 2024 where she should be competing in the Women's four event, focusing on adding another Olympic medal to her impressive career for Team GB.

programme.title: Finals Piste: Women's Epee Team Bronze & Gold Medal Bouts | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Epee Team Finals took place on 30/07/2024 at the Grand Palais - Podium Piste. Italy won the Gold medal over France, who took Silver. Poland won the Bronze over China.

programme.title: Global Games II (Part I)
programme.desc: Four Olympians and four social media stars from around the world go head to head in mash-up competitions with an Olympic twist.

programme.title: Women Synchronised 3m Springboard | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Synchronised 3m Springboard Diving took place at the Aquatics Centre in France on the 27/07/24. Yani Chang/Yiwen Chen (CHN) won the Gold Medal, Sarah Bacon/Kassidy Cook (USA) won the Silver Medal and Yasmin Harper/Scarlett Mew Jensen (GBR) won the Bronze Medal.

programme.title: In war-torn Iraq, this wheelchair fencer brings a message of hope
programme.desc: In Iraq, a roadside bomb left Ammar Ali in a wheelchair. The Paralympian is now determined to lead Iraq's wheelchair fencing team to gold.

programme.title: ARG-BEL Women's Bronze Medal Match | Hockey | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Bronze Medal Match with Argentina and Belgium took place on the 09/08/2024 at the Yves-du-Manoir Stadium - 1. Final Score ARG 2(3):2(1) BEL.

programme.title: NED - CHN - Women's Gold Medal Match | Hockey | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Gold Medal Match took place at Yves-du-Manoir Stadium, Paris, on 09/08/2024. Netherlands won Gold with a final score NED 1(3):(1)1 CHN.

programme.title: Fashion Olympics: Making a Mark
programme.desc: Discover all those athletes that have made a brand of themselves based in style and performance.

programme.title: Semi-Finals & Finals | Cycling BMX Racing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Cycling BMX Racing Semi-Finals & Finals took place on 02/08/2024 at Saint-Quentin-en-Yvelines BMX Stadium.
The Men's Final was won by Joris Daudet (FRA) with Gold, Sylvain Andre (FRA) with Silver and Romain Mahieu (FRA) with Bronze.
The Women's Final was won by Saya Sakakibara (AUS) with Gold, Manon Veenstra (NED) with Silver and Zoe Claessens (SUI) with Bronze.

programme.title: Day Jobs | Episode 4
programme.desc: Thomas and Glen Murihead, a pair of curling brothers, are also sheep farmers while judoka Ben Fletcher works at a family gardening shop.

programme.title: Women's 10km | Marathon Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 10Km Marathon Swimming Race was held on 08/08/2024 at Paris Pont Alexandre III. Sharon Van Rouwendaal (NED) claimed Gold with a time of 2:03:34.2, Moesha Johnson (AUS) took Silver andGinevra Taddeucci (ITA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women Synchronised 3m Springboard | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Synchronised 3m Springboard Diving took place at the Aquatics Centre in France on the 27/07/24. Yani Chang/Yiwen Chen (CHN) won the Gold Medal, Sarah Bacon/Kassidy Cook (USA) won the Silver Medal and Yasmin Harper/Scarlett Mew Jensen (GBR) won the Bronze Medal.

programme.title: Sydney's Olympic legacy through the eyes of Aaron Royle and Loudy Wiggins
programme.desc: Sixteen years on, we discover Aaron Royle's Olympic moment that inspired his own journey, and trace the birth of Australia's diving stars.

programme.title: Anatomy of a diver and a gymnast
programme.desc: The first-ever male Jamaican Olympic Diver and a World Champion Italian Gymnast are physically analysed in a lab.

programme.title: Women's Qualification & Final | Trampoline Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 02/08/2024 at the Bercy Arena, Paris. Bryony Page (GBR) claimed Gold, Viyaleta Bardzilouskaya (AIN) took Silver and Sophiane Methot (CAN) completed the podium.

programme.title: The Bryony Page story (extended version)
programme.desc: Bryony Page had to overcome an extraordinary mental obstacle on her way to becoming Team GB’s first ever Olympic trampoline medallist.

programme.title: Women's 10m Platform Final | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: Women's 10m Platform Final took place at the Aquatics Centre, on 06/08/24. Quan Hongchan (CHN) won Gold, Chen Yuxi (CHN) won Silver and Kim Mi Rae (PRK) completed the podium.

programme.title: Sydney's Olympic legacy through the eyes of Aaron Royle and Loudy Wiggins
programme.desc: Sixteen years on, we discover Aaron Royle's Olympic moment that inspired his own journey, and trace the birth of Australia's diving stars.

programme.title: Men's 3m Springboard Semi-Final | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 3m Springboard Diving Semi-Finals took place at the Aquatics Centre in France on the 7/08/24. Zongyuan Wang (CHN), Siyi Xie (CHN) and Jack Laugher (GBR) were the best of the session.

programme.title: Anatomy of a diver and a gymnast
programme.desc: The first-ever male Jamaican Olympic Diver and a World Champion Italian Gymnast are physically analysed in a lab.

programme.title: Long Jump Decathlon Group A | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Decathlon Group A Long Jump took place on 02/08/2024 at the Stade de France. Ayden Owens-Delerme (PUR) led the event with a 7.66m jump.

programme.title: Long Jump Decathlon Group B | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Decathlon Group B Long Jump took place on 02/08/2024 at the Stade de France. Sander Skotheim (NOR) led the event with an 8.03m jump.

programme.title: What Moves Me (Film)
programme.desc: Watch how world-class athletes overcame common personal barriers and started their own impossible

programme.title: Men's Qualification & Final | Trampoline Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 02/08/2024 at the Bercy Arena, Paris. Ivan Litvinovich (AIN) claimed Gold, Zisai Wang (CHN) took Silver and Langyu Yan (CHN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Sports Swap: Basketball vs Trampoline with Emmeline Ndongue & Kat Driscoll
programme.desc: Can an Olympic trampolinist shoot a 3-pointer? Can a basketball Olympic silver medallist learn a trampoline routine in a day?

programme.title: Meet the Olympian bouncing between trampoline and her career as a doctor
programme.desc: Three-time Olympian Ana Rente stumbled into a medical career, but although finding time for training is draining the rewards are huge.

programme.title: Women's Triple Jump Qualifying A | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: Join the Women's Triple Jump Qualifying A.

programme.title: Women's Triple Jump Qualifying B | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: Join the Women's Triple Jump Qualifying B.

programme.title: Meet Flo Meiler the 85-year-old grandma breaking world records
programme.desc: Flo started to pole vault at 65. Every day she proves that age is no barrier. She is one of the most decorated senior athletes ever. We follow her as she is getting ready to shatter and set more world records at the National Senior Games.

programme.title: Anatomy of a Sprinter: The Explosive Powers of Tori Bowie
programme.desc: We took Team USA sprinter and Rio 2016 Gold Medallist Tori Bowie to a science lab and examined her physique to find out what it takes to be a world class champion in short distance running. With the help fellow Olympian Lolo Jones, each episode of our sports science original series Anatomy of studies the powers and physiques of an elite athlete to find out what makes them special in their sport.

programme.title: Men's Pole Vault Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Men's Pole Vault Final took place at the Stade de France, France, on 05/08/2024. Armand Duplantis (SWE) broke the World Record with a height of 6.25m. Sam Kendricks (USA) won Silver and Emmanouil Karalis (GRE) completed the podium.
